Use the following generation settings:

Tone: Write in a neutral, information-focused tone.Mild emphasis is allowed to clarify relevance, but avoid emotional language, exaggeration, or persuasive phrasing.The tone should remain calm and descriptive.

generated_body: The article titled "Body of missing Salvadoran trans activist found" is likely to report on the discovery of the body of a trans activist who had previously been reported missing. Readers may expect details surrounding the circumstances of the disappearance, including any relevant background information about the activist's work and advocacy within the community. The piece could also touch upon the broader implications of this incident for the safety of marginalized individuals in similar contexts, as well as any responses from local authorities or activist organizations regarding the case.
